content.raw:
I can't find another instance of `Quiet` being used to suppress a message like that, are we sure this is the recommended way of suppressing this?

On a related note, I see that on ign-common the files which are prompting this error are the `.h` ones which should be suppressed on [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/137/added-cppcheck-suppressions/diff) pull request, should they be reaching here?
